text:
ZDEV | London, UK | Full-time, Remote | Engineer / Manager | $80-130k

We're a startup software consultancy / agency that trains people to code and puts them to work building high-quality software (apps and websites). Our stack is Javascript / React / React-Native.

We're looking for someone who's a solid engineer to come onboard and look after a team of junior developers and help manage their projects (speaking to clients, estimating timelines, helping them with technical challenges).

You need to have a good timezone overlap with London.

Please read our blog post for more info:

https://medium.com/zdev-engineering/help-us-teach-people-to-...
